subject: Re: [junit] Possible Eclipse issue in CVS
msgSnippet: ... It s a junit problem. The easiest solution would probably be to specify that the project uses the eclipse default jdk and trust that the user has set that
messageBody:
> Not sure if this is JUnit's problem or mine. I just replaced my checkout
> of the version 4 branch with the latest code from CVS and I'm getting
> this error in Eclipse (Mac OS X):
>
> Build path entry is missing:
> org.ecli...g.ui.launcher.StandardVMType/Java1502
>
It's a junit problem. The easiest solution would probably be to specify that the project uses the eclipse default jdk and trust that the user has set that to a 1.5 version.

- Neil
